snippet: Can you calculate the behind-the-wheel cell phone use in 2009 if you know the 2010 rate and the percentage increase in use between 2009 and 2010?
abstract: Can you calculate the behind-the-wheel cell phone use in 2009 if you know the 2010 rate and the percentage increase in use between 2009 and 2010?
lead_paragraph: Test your math skills with this question created by Scott Matthews at Math for America from the article "Reframing the Debate Over Using Phones Behind the Wheel."
